text: "Girls in the City" is a song written by Tony Hester and performed by The Esquires. It reached No. 18 on the US R&B; chart and No. 120 on the Billboard pop chart in 1971.The Esquires, "Girls in the City" chart positions Retrieved August 22, 2016. The song was produced by Bill Sheppard and Walter Gardner and arranged by Mike Terry.The Esquires, "Girls in the City" single release Retrieved August 22, 2016. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:1971 singles Category:The Esquires songs
title: Girls in the City
